name: Color Full Adventure
description:
This game was made by a team of newbies for GamesPlusJam 2022 in two days.

How to play:

  • Move your paint can with WASD or arrow keys.
  • Collect cyan, magenta or yellow paint from wells around the platform.
  • Mix them up inside the well in the center of the platform to create the target color (Get close and press space).
  • Beware the big evil boot!!!

Assets used:

  • https://3dtextures.me/2022/03/09/concrete-019/
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/paintcan-a6252da2d2c24499b66cebe454fb1df7
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-water-well-344e643c8a404253b5990c9a3cb4...
  • https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-ready-timberland-working-boots-3d-mode...

Contributors:

  • https://yusuf-i-toonbull.itch.io/
  • https://burakakan.itch.io/
  • https://hasansertdemir.itch.io/
  • https://yavuzeren.itch.io/
